review_details: Nourriture acceptable mais service beaucoup trop lent et peu chaleureux. A eviter un samedi soir. Nous avons mis 4:00 pour manger des entree et plat. Scandaleux

Such a great experience to go and fish with Anthi. It has been a long time since I was looking for an authentic fishing experience... and I've found the best one in Santorini... 5 hours of fishing, eating fantastic shrimps and fishes, jumping into the transparent water... Everything was nice during this trip and I'll warmly recommand this experience to my friends. We even got 2 octopuses... So great!
reviewFor: Santorini Traditional Fishing Experience with transportation
